About Mayor McCarty
-------------------

### City Council

* Elected Mayor (May 2024)

* Crime Control and Prevention District, Chair

* Served 2 terms as President of the Board of Trustees.
* Elected Board of Trustees, 2011, 2012, 2015, and 2018
* As President, fought and won the right to open school board meetings with a prayer,
  (U.S. Court of Appeals, 5th Circuit)

* Sunday School Teacher (over 30 years) for Cross Church NRH
* Served as a Board Member for both the Richland Hills Riding Club and Keller Saddle Club

* Member of The Texas Society of Certified Public Accountants (TSCPA)
* Richland High School Graduate, Class of 1980

* [Contact Us](https://www.nrhtx.com/directory.aspx)
